meanings.meaning: at the end of the week

vlive.korean: 이번에 조금 어... This time... Uh... 듣기 View video VICTON : 월요일밤!!병찬이랑

이번에... 아 나부터? Wait, starting with me? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
